items.content_html: Dropzy (Drop Easy) is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for local WiFi networks. Share files fast, securely, and offline between devices—no cloud needed. Built with Next JS. Simple, cross-platform, and lightweight. Perfect for quick, private transfers.
items.title: MuhammedFayazTS/Dropzy: Dropzy (Drop Easy) is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for local WiFi networks. Share files fast, securely, and offline between devices—no cloud needed. Built with Next JS. Simple, cross-platform, and lightweight. Perfect for quick, private transfers.

items.content_html: Cloudland is a lightweight Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) framework designed to manage virtual machine instances, software-defined networks (SDN), storage volumes, and more...
items.title: IBM/cloudland: Cloudland is a lightweight Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) framework designed to manage virtual machine instances, software-defined networks (SDN), storage volumes, and more...

items.content_html: js-dlogger is a lightweight, configurable logger for JavaScript, React.js, and React Native applications. It provides structured logging with different levels (info, debug, dLog, Warn, Error) and supports environment-based logging.
items.title: structlooper/js-dlogger: js-dlogger is a lightweight, configurable logger for JavaScript, React.js, and React Native applications. It provides structured logging with different levels (info, debug, dLog, Warn, Error) and supports environment-based logging.

items.content_html: Logato is a lightweight and fast logger for Node.js, designed for easy logging of messages, warnings, errors, and more. It supports color-coded logs, file logging, and even printing file contents directly to the console. Perfect for developers who need a simple and efficient logging solution.
items.title: devnshankar/logato: Logato is a lightweight and fast logger for Node.js, designed for easy logging of messages, warnings, errors, and more. It supports color-coded logs, file logging, and even printing file contents directly to the console. Perfect for developers who need a simple and efficient logging solution.
